promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute epic bull grass-type pokemon wearing dark gemstones. It can be found in forest-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, grass or bull. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Gemsteer, a a chibi cute epic bull grass-type pokemon. It can be found in forest-like environments It has the following abilities: Chaos Wheel. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "bull", "grass" or "Gemsteer". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, bull-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, emerald galaxy background
generatedDescription: Emerald-encrusted and playful, this forest-dwelling creature gallops fearlessly. Gemsteer channel Chaos Wheel, turning trouble to tranquility.
